page.title: 03FARMING - MACHINERY
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375} FARMING 2 - Machinery.Mechanical equipment is an essential part of the farm.Tractors have superceeded the horse as the principal power source. All farms have at least three tractors used to plough and pull other farm equipment.Cultivators are being used more and more replacing the rake and the harrow.There are usually two cultivators per farm.Where potatoes are grown (early potatoes being a speciality in Mid-Cheshire) the potato harvester is an essential item of equipment.4 of the 8 farms surveyed grew potatoes and each had a harvester.The forage harvester used for cutting grass for silage product- ion is a necessary piece of equipment. All farms with cattle (8 surveyed) used this mechanical aid.
